name: Battle Evasion
description:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person + third person shooter ?

Battle Evasion is a fast-paced FPS + TPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a tactical operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based FPS + TPS!

Game currently in Beginner Phase: Battle Evasion is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!
